docs.text: Class: FieldResearchSite A site, outside of a laboratory, from which biosamples may be collected. URI: cleanroom_schema:FieldResearchSite classDiagram class FieldResearchSite Site <|-- FieldResearchSite FieldResearchSite : description FieldResearchSite : id FieldResearchSite : name Inheritance NamedThing ImmaterialEntity Site FieldResearchSite Slots | Name | Cardinality and Range | Description | Inheritance | | --- | --- | --- | --- || name | 0..1 NONE | A human-readable name for a thing | NamedThing | | description | 0..1 NONE | A human-readable description for a thing | NamedThing | | id | 1..1 xsd:anyURI | A unique identifier for a thing | NamedThing | Usages used by used in type used Biosample collected_from range FieldResearchSite DataLists frs_list range FieldResearchSite Comments Provides grouping of biosamples at level that's more specific than belonging to the same study In Bioscales, one might say that rhizosphere soil and bulk soil from around the same plant were obtained at the same site. In this case, the site would have a 1:1 correspondence to the plant.
